These are words that describe a group of people, animals or things.
A bunch of penguins is running on the ice.
An army of ants is crawling on the tree branch.
A flock of sheep is eating grass.
A swarm of bees is covering the beehive.
A fleet of ships is heading towards the cargo vessel.
A troop of soldiers is marching up a mountain.
A crowd of people is cheering for the new mayor of the city.
A gang of bikers is riding their motorcycles down the street.
A colony of bacteria is visible under a microscope.
